content.organization: Probability/Statistics I\&II Grader, Grinnell College Mathematics Department
content: Graded 60 assignments a week, collaborating with a professor on providing useful and allowable feedback to students
Corresponded with professor on grading, academic issues, and implementing solutions to help students
Used RStudio to provide feedback to students on theoretical and applied statistics

content.organization: Allstate Corporation, AES Development Operations Team
content: Created a Java daemon process to monitor NAS INode utilization, disk utilization, and subdirectory file counts for diagnostic purposes, using Log4j2 for logging purposes
Developed a wrapper Python program to streamline the process of creating a Jupyter Deployment on a Kubernetes environment, maintaining documentation of the program for future use and maintenance
Helped coordinate testing of the wrapper program with multiple teams, responding to feedback and implementing suggestions
Presented progress on projects to management and engineering team on a weekly basis, discussing high-level and technical details to direct the progress of projects for the future

content.organization: Democratic Systems Inc. - Project is in Private GitHub Repository Owned by DSI
content: Created an interactive website, complete with a frontend written in Vue JS and a backend written in Flask \& MySQL.
Implemented frontend using a Vue JS components-based architecture and retrieved information to display to the user via HTTP GET requests from the Flask \& MySQL backend.
Coordinated the multiple month development process with team members in-person and GitHub, using Agile development and SCRUM meetings.
Communicated progress of project to Democratic Systems Inc. through weekly meetings, making sure the product met the needs of the client.
Created a chess engine with an AI using the minimax algorithm with alpha-beta pruning
Optimized legal move generation with bitboards to allow the AI to evaluate approximately 200,000 positions in less than a second with alpha-beta pruning, transposition tables, and move ordering
Validated tens of millions of board states via the Stockfish chess engine to verify legal move generation
